data.title: Oscar Awards Category, Categories of Academy Awards
data.text:
The Academy Award for Best Visual Effects is a distinguished award bestowed in recognition of the best and exceptional visual effects work in films.

Know all about Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Actor in a Leading Role.

Know about the winners in the category of the Academy Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role.

Know all about Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Actress in a Leading Role.

Read here to get information on the actresses who have won Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Actress in a Supporting Role.

Oscar for Best-Adapted Screenplay is an important segment of the Academy awards ceremony.

'Oscar Award for Best Animated Feature' was initiated in the year 2001.

'Oscar for Best-Animated Short Film' was given from the fifth awards ceremony. Check out the list of winners of this Academy Award.

Oscar for Best Art Direction has undergone many changes till date. Know more about 'Academy Award for Best Art Direction'.

'Oscar for Best Cinematography' is presented to those associated with camera and lighting in a film. Explore the winners of this Academy Award.

The costumes speak a lot about the character in a movie. Check out the list of winners of Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Costume Design.

Oscar for Best Director is one of the most important award categories. Check out the list of 'Academy Award for Best Director' winners.

'Oscar for Best Documentary Feature' is for films based on real life. Check out films that have won Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature.

Check out the list of the award-winning films in the retired category of Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Documentary Short Subject.

Through this article, explore the list of the winners in the category of Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Film Editing.

The category of Best Foreign Language Film was created in Oscars in 1956. Read to know more on Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film.

Makeup artists play a vital role in the film industry. Read here to explore the winners of 'Academy Award for Best Makeup'.

'Oscar for Best Original Score' relates to the soundtrack of a film. Read on to know more about 'Academy Award for Original Music Score'.

Story is the soul of a movie. Go through the article and get a list of winners of Oscar (Academy Award) for writing Best Original Screenplay/Story.

Songs infuse life into a movie. Read to know about the winners of Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Original Song.

'Oscar for Best Original Story' was substituted in the year 1957. Read on to explore the winners of Academy Award for Best Original Story.

A film/picture is a collaborative effort of many people, taken together. Know about the Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Picture.

'Oscar for Best Sound Editing' is given for excellence in the sound design of a film. Read to know more on 'Academy Award for Best Sound Editing'.

Read this article to know about the winners in the category of Oscar (Academy Award) for Best Sound Mixing.

Check out the names of the movies that have received the 'Oscar (Academy Award) for Live Action Short Film'.
